 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקַב‎</span>] **verb** ==pierce== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#SI|SI]]<sup>1.1.4</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הנקבה‎</span> ***the piercing, boring through***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְקַב‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶקְכָּא‎</span> ***hole***, etc.; Sinaitic proper name, masculine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקבו‎</span> [[BDB#Eut|Eut]]<sup> 441, 2</sup>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקיבו‎</span> [[BDB#Eut|Eut]]<sup>99, 2; 153, 2</sup> ([[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>325. 326</sup> [[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>33</sup>); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***na‡bu***</u></abbr>, ***depth***, ***spring*** of water; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***perforate, pierce, scrutinize***, etc.,<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sagacity***, etc.; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***leader, chief*** (one who ***scrutinizes***)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקָבָהּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.21|2Kgs 18:21]]; [[Isa.36.6|Isa 36:6]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקַבְתָּ‎</span>; [[Hab.3.14|Hab 3:14]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנְקָבֿ‎</span> [[Job.40.24|Job 40:24]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקֹּב‎</span> [[2Kgs.12.10|2Kgs 12:10]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקָּבֶ֑נּוּ‎</span> [[Isa.62.2|Isa 62:2]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקֹּב‎</span> [[Job.40.26|Job 40:26]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקְבָה‎</span> [[Gen.30.28|Gen 30:28]] ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקוּב‎</span> [[Hag.1.6|Hag 1:6]] plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקֻבֵי‎</span>; [[Amos.6.1|Amos 6:1]] — 

**1.** ***pierce, bore*** with accusative [[2Kgs.18.21|2Kgs 18:21]] = [[Isa.36.6|Isa 36:6]]; [[Hab.3.14|Hab 3:14]] (all in figure), [[Job.40.24|Job 40:24]]; [[Job.40.26|Job 40:26]] with accusative of congnate meaning with verb + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקֹּב חֹר בְּרַלְתּוֺ‎</span> [[2Kgs.12.10|2Kgs 12:10]] ***and he bored a hole in its lid***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְרוֺר נָקוּב‎</span> [[Hag.1.8|Hag 1:8]] ***a bag pierced***, i.e. with a hole in it. 

**2.** ***prick off***, designate, wages [[Gen.30.28|Gen 30:28]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), name [[Isa.62.2|Isa 62:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject; compare **Niph\`al**); passive participle ***noted, distinguished*** [[Amos.6.1|Amos 6:1]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(אֲשֶׁר) נִקְּבוּ בְשֵׁמוֺת‎</span> ***who were pricked off, designated, by name*** [[Num.1.17|Num 1:17]]; [[1Chr.12.32|1Chr 12:32]] (31 [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H]]), [[1Chr.16.41|1Chr 16:41]]; [[2Chr.28.3|2Chr 28:3]]; [[2Chr.31.19|2Chr 31:19]], compare [[Ezra.8.20|Ezra 8:20]]. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקַב‎</span>] **verb** ==curse== (perhaps akin to I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקב‎</span> perhaps secondary formative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָבַב‎</span>, q. v. for forms <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקֹּב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹב‎</span>, etc.); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקְבוֺ שֵׁם‎</span> [[Lev.24.16|Lev 24:16]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹקֵב שֵׁם י‎</span> v[[Lev.24.16|Lev 24:16]] (on text see [[BDB#Di|Di]], [[BDB#Gei|Gei]]<sup>Urschrift 274</sup> [[BDB#Dalm|Dalm]]<sup>Adonal 44 f.</sup>).
